summary: COMPLAINT REGARDING 2004 NISSAN QUEST TOW PACKAGE AND WIRING DESIGN FLAW.*MR  THE CONSUMER STATED THE DIRECTIONAL LIGHTS ONLY BLINKED ONCE WHEN A TRAILER WAS CONNECTED TO AN AFTER MARKET WIRING HARNESS.  THE DEALER INFORMED THE CONSUMER  THAT THEY DID NOT KNOW THE TOW PACKAGE NEEDED TO BE ORDERED FROM THE FACTORY.  *JB
